titleStmt.title: Englands rejoicing at that happy day that peace and truth may bear sway, being th' election of that thing, in chusing us a royal king, to the tune of, Gallant souldiers [sic] do not muse.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Right half sheet contains "The second part, to the same tune."
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
